There’s no treat more special for your loved ones than the McDonald’s Breakfast Deluxe Supreme Special: Crispy turkey bacon, fluffy scrambled eggs, sizzling sausage, warm pancakes, a toasted English muffin, delicious hashbrown and refreshing Iced Milo®. 

Free Iced Milo® (S) upgrade is only available in-store for Breakfast Deluxe Supreme Extra Value Meal™ from 21 Nov to 31 Dec 2013. Not available via McDelivery™, institutional stores and for other Breakfast Extra Value Meals™. Visit https://www.mcdonalds.com.sg/promotions/breakfast-deluxe-supreme-special/ for more details.

T&Cs:
- Promotion is valid with a minimum purchase of $5. Transaction must be made by NETS or NETS FlashPay. 
- Valid from 14-18 November, or while stocks last, in Singapore only.
- Valid for dine-in, Drive thru and takeaways, after breakfast hours. 
- Not available for McDelivery, McCafe, Dessert Kiosks and institutional stores.

I called for Delivery last night cos I wanted to try this ebi burger. The order did not arrive after one hour +. Much longer than the given estimated timing. Got to call back to track the status, only to have the operator said their drivers had knocked off, so she asked if I can wait for another 15-20mins. I m not really hard up for a burger to wait for almost 2 hours in total for it. If you have manpower issues, then don't provide delivery service; on the other hand, if you do provide such a service, it's your duty to ensure you have enough manpower to service your customers. "No manpower" must not be an excuse to customers. So sad that such unprofessional reply were to come from McDonald's.
